agelimit.help: Age limit for quarantined files (0 - 479 hours, 0 means forever).
agelimit.name: agelimit

destination.help: Choose whether to quarantine files to the FortiGate disk or to FortiAnalyzer or to delete them instead of quarantining them.
destination.name: destination

options.help: Files that would be quarantined are deleted.
options.name: NULL

options.help: Quarantine files to the FortiGate hard disk.
options.name: disk

drop-blocked.help: Do not quarantine dropped files found in sessions using the selected protocols. Dropped files are deleted instead of being quarantined.
drop-blocked.name: drop-blocked

drop-heuristic.help: Do not quarantine files detected by heuristics found in sessions using the selected protocols. Dropped files are deleted instead of being quarantined.
drop-heuristic.name: drop-heuristic

drop-infected.help: Do not quarantine infected files found in sessions using the selected protocols. Dropped files are deleted instead of being quarantined.
drop-infected.name: drop-infected

lowspace.help: Select the method for handling additional files when running low on disk space.
lowspace.name: lowspace

options.help: Drop (delete) the most recently quarantined files.
options.name: drop-new

options.help: Overwrite the oldest quarantined files. That is, the files that are closest to being deleted from the quarantine.
options.name: ovrw-old

maxfilesize.help: Maximum file size to quarantine (0 - 500 Mbytes, 0 means unlimited).
maxfilesize.name: maxfilesize

quarantine-quota.help: The amount of disk space to reserve for quarantining files (0 - 4294967295 Mbytes, depends on disk space).
quarantine-quota.name: quarantine-quota

store-blocked.help: Quarantine blocked files found in sessions using the selected protocols.
store-blocked.name: store-blocked

store-heuristic.help: Quarantine files detected by heuristics found in sessions using the selected protocols.
store-heuristic.name: store-heuristic

store-infected.help: Quarantine infected files found in sessions using the selected protocols.
store-infected.name: store-infected
